name: The Gary Goldstein Dating Sim
description:
Ever wanted to date that handsome lawyer from StarKid's Black Friday? Well, now you can! The Gary Goldstein Dating Sim is a full-length visual novel in which you navigate the trials of dating the self-ascribed best lawyer in town. It features not only Gary Goldstein himself, but a number of other characters from the Hatchetfield universe. 

The game includes a fully produced chiptune soundtrack (made by Chipped Tunes), a full story with multiple endings, and an array of character and background art. All character art and writing/programming by Meepzer, with backgrounds by Alex "Skelekidd."

NOTE: This is the beta release for the game. There are a few minor missing features (i.e. some of the backgrounds). Also, the saving and loading features are a bit buggy: after you load a save file, you have to click "back" for it to register. Sorry about that.
